quotes.quote: Empty pockets make empty heads.
Build pockets of stillness into your life.
A little in one's own pocket is better than much in another man's purse.
The emptiness of your pocket is not a recipe for you to discount the value of your passion!
Empty pockets never held anyone back. Only empty heads and empty hearts can do that.
Reaching into someone else's pocket to assist one's fellow man hardly qualifies as charity.
He who fills His pockets with the Rocks of Misdeeds shall surely sink in the River of Good Fortune.
You can go with an empty pocket and come back heavily loaded if you allow your passion to escort you!
Money is always there but the pockets change; it is not in the same pockets after a change, and that is all there is to say about money.
The traveller with empty pockets will sing in the thief 's face.
Poverty is not what’s in your pocket – its what you have in your head.
The true wealth of a man is not what's in his pocket, but what's in his heart.
Don't plan with what is in your pocket; plan with what is in God's pocket.
An expansive life, one not constrained by four walls, requires as well an expansive pocket.
It's no use filling your pocket with money if you have got a hole in the corner.
A rich person who has no love in his heart is poorer than a poor person who has no money in his pocket.
We need a coat with two pockets. In one pocket there is dust, and in the other pocket there is gold. We need a coat with two pockets to remind us who we are.
May your pockets be heavy and your heart be light. May good luck pursue you each morning and night.
Pockets have long been a male/female divide.
The heart contracts as the pocket expands.
A man's looks are measured by the depth of his pockets.
Its easier to feel a little more spiritual with a couple of bucks in your pocket.
Take your hands out of your pocket, because life may push you hardly at any time!
The appeal to the white man's pocket has ever been more effectual than all the appeals ever made to his conscience.
With some money in your pocket you walk confidently, you talk confidently and you work confidently.
Another is, if you take money out of your left pocket and put it in your right pocket, you're no richer.
Assets put money in your pocket, whether you work or not, and liabilities take money from your pocket.
